item.title: Enterprise Architecture Framework
item.description: Architecture domain Since Stephen Spewak’s Enterprise Architecture Planning (EAP) in 1993, and perhaps before then, it has been normal to divide enterprises architecture into four architecture domains. Business architecture, Data architecture, Applications architecture, Technology architecture. Layers of the enterprise architecture
